title: 2(X)IST Mens Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck T-Shirt 3-Pack
description: 100% COTTON: Crafted in pure cotton, this naturally breathable Slim Fit Deep V-Neck offers the support you rely on. Durable yet soft, lightweight & comfortable for long lasting wear.
Multipack of 2(X)IST Men's Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck T-Shirts, Men's underwear base layers featuring a tagless slim fit, deep V-neckline, and short sleeves.
MOISTURE CONTROL: 2(X)IST Men's Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck T-Shirts are breathable and transmits moisture away from the body, allowing you to remain comfortable all day
DURABILITY: Strong tensile strength cotton makes 2(X)IST Cotton T-Shirts a great long lasting base layer
Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck Tee in a convenient 3-Pack

Keep it simple with a timeless V-neck tee rendered in ultra soft cotton. It's designed to fit close to the body for a more contemporary shape. 2(X)IST Men's Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck T-Shirt featuring a slim, modern fit with a deep V-neckline and short sleeves. Our Essential Cotton is soft, durable, and made only of natural fibers making this a classic that has been trusted to provide all-day comfort. Because it's 100% cotton, the material will naturally stretch, but one quick wash-n-dry and it will reform its shape. Essential Cotton Slim Fit Deep V-Neck Tee in a convenient 3-Pack.
